verses.verse: Now the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> after their <S%H4557>number,<s%> to wit, the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H1>fathers<s%> and <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> and their <S%H7860>officers<s%> that <S%H8334>served<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1697>matter<s%> of the <S%H4256>courses,<s%> which came <S%H935>in<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> month by <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H2320><s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2320>months<s%> of the <S%H8141>year,<s%> of <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

Over <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4256>course<s%> for the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H3434>Jashobeam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2068>Zabdiel:<s%> and <S%H5921>in<s%> his <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

Of <S%H4480><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez<s%> was the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%> for the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>

And <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4256>course<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H1737>Dodai<s%> an <S%H266>Ahohite,<s%> and of his <S%H4256>course<s%> was <S%H4732>Mikloth<s%> also the <S%H5057>ruler:<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> his <S%H4256>course<s%> likewise were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

The <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%> for the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada,<s%> a <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H3548>priest:<s%> and <S%H5921>in<s%> his <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

This <S%H1931><s%> is that <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> who was <S%H1368>mighty<s%> among the <S%H7970>thirty,<s%> and <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H7970>thirty:<s%> and in his <S%H4256>course<s%> was <S%H5990>Ammizabad<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

The <S%H7243>fourth<s%> captain for the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H6214>Asahel<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> and <S%H2069>Zebadiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him: and <S%H5921>in<s%> his <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

The <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> for the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H8049>Shamhuth<s%> the <S%H3155>Izrahite:<s%> and <S%H5921>in<s%> his <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

The <S%H8066>eighth<s%> captain for the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H5444>Sibbecai<s%> the <S%H2843>Hushathite,<s%> of the <S%H2227>Zarhites:<s%> and <S%H5921>in<s%> his <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

The <S%H8671>ninth<s%> captain for the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H44>Abiezer<s%> the <S%H6069>Anetothite,<s%> of the <S%H1145>Benjamites:<s%> and <S%H5921>in<s%> his <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

The <S%H6224>tenth<s%> captain for the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H4121>Maharai<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite,<s%> of the <S%H2227>Zarhites:<s%> and <S%H5921>in<s%> his <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

The <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> captain for the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H6553>Pirathonite,<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim:<s%> and <S%H5921>in<s%> his <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

The <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> captain for the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H2469>Heldai<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite,<s%> of <S%H6274>Othniel:<s%> and <S%H5921>in<s%> his <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

Furthermore <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> the <S%H5057>ruler<s%> of the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%> was <S%H461>Eliezer<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2147>Zichri:<s%> of the <S%H8099>Simeonites,<s%> <S%H8203>Shephatiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of Maachah: <S%H4601><s%>
Of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7055>Kemuel:<s%> of the <S%H175>Aaronites,<s%> Zadok: <S%H6659><s%>

Of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H453>Elihu,<s%> one of the <S%H4480>brethren<s%> <S%H251><s%> of <S%H1732>David:<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> <S%H6018>Omri<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of Michael: <S%H4317><s%>
Of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H3460>Ishmaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5662>Obadiah:<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H3406>Jerimoth<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of Azriel: <S%H5837><s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H1954>Hoshea<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5812>Azaziah:<s%> of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H3100>Joel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of Pedaiah: <S%H6305><s%>

Of the <S%H2677>half<s%> tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> <S%H3035>Iddo<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2148>Zechariah:<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H3300>Jaasiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of Abner: <S%H74><s%>
Of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> <S%H5832>Azareel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> were the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

But <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of them from twenty years <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H6242><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and <S%H4295>under:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> he would <S%H7235>increase<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> like to the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>

Joab <S%H3097><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H4487>number,<s%> but he <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> because there <S%H1961>fell<s%> <S%H7110>wrath<s%> for <S%H2063>it<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> was the <S%H4557>number<s%> <S%H5927>put<s%> in the <S%H4557>account<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%>

And <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H214>treasures<s%> was <S%H5820>Azmaveth<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5717>Adiel:<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H214>storehouses<s%> in the <S%H7704>fields,<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and in the <S%H3723>villages,<s%> and in the <S%H4026>castles,<s%> was <S%H3083>Jehonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of Uzziah: <S%H5818><s%>

And <S%H5921>over<s%> them that <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> for <S%H5656>tillage<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%> was <S%H5836>Ezri<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of Chelub: <S%H3620><s%>

And <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> was <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> the <S%H7435>Ramathite:<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the increase of the <S%H7945>vineyards<s%> <S%H3754><s%> for the <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H214>cellars<s%> was <S%H2067>Zabdi<s%> the Shiphmite: <S%H8225><s%>

And <S%H5921>over<s%> the olive <S%H2132>trees<s%> and the sycamore <S%H8256>trees<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in the low <S%H8219>plains<s%> was <S%H1177>Baal-hanan<s%> the <S%H1451>Gederite:<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H214>cellars<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> was Joash: <S%H3135><s%>

And <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H1241>herds<s%> that <S%H7462>fed<s%> in <S%H8289>Sharon<s%> was <S%H7861>Shitrai<s%> the <S%H8290>Sharonite:<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H1241>herds<s%> that were in the <S%H6010>valleys<s%> was <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of Adlai: <S%H5724><s%>
Over <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H1581>camels<s%> also was <S%H179>Obil<s%> the <S%H3458>Ishmaelite:<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H860>asses<s%> was <S%H3165>Jehdeiah<s%> the Meronothite: <S%H4824><s%>

And <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> was <S%H3151>Jaziz<s%> the <S%H1905>Hagerite.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were the <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of the <S%H7399>substance<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David's.<s%>

Also <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H1730>uncle<s%> was a <S%H3289>counselor,<s%> a <S%H995>wise<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and a <S%H5608>scribe:<s%> and <S%H3171>Jehiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2453>Hachmoni<s%> was <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> sons: <S%H1121><s%>
And <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> was the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H3289>counselor:<s%> and <S%H2365>Hushai<s%> the <S%H757>Archite<s%> was the <S%H4428>king's<s%> companion: <S%H7453><s%>

And <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> was <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> and <S%H54>Abiathar:<s%> and the <S%H8269>general<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6635>army<s%> was <S%H3097>Joab.<s%>
